when:
Thursday 11th July 2024 Sponsors' Evening
Friday 12th July 2024 6pm - 11pm
Saturday 13th July 2024 Noon - 11pm
howmuch:
£6 door entry (includes glass)
Tokens are £2 each
1 token for a half pint of beer/cider
2 tokens for a pint of beer/cider
2 tokens for a single gin
4 tokens for a double gin
Soft Drinks are FREE

location.address: Lymm Village Hall, Pepper Street, Lymm, WA13 0JB

food: Food will be available to purchase from Chia Tapas Bar

brews.name: Glacier.
brews.description: Light, pure water session pale ale, with a delicate hop finish. What it lacks in ABV it makes up for in flavour, and 'sessionability'!

brews.name: Onikuma
brews.description: First of our dry-hopped summer pale series, using an old favourite - Citra.

brews.name: It's Another App
brews.description: A fresh lemon, and grapefruit aroma. Pineapple sweetness in the middle and a clean firm bitterness on the finish

brews.name: There's A Thread Somewhere
brews.description: Layers of lemon, orange and grapefruit over a fluffy wheaty body. Clean firm bitterness

brews.name: One More Turn
brews.description: A blonde ale with citrus notes followed by a refreshing, pleasantly spicy tone, giving it a lovely-jubbly lightness. A slightly hoppy taste, with notes of fresh hops and fruit. High in bitterness, the perfect sessionable ale. Cushty!

brews.name: Halargian
brews.description: Tropical grapefruit with stone fruit and zesty citrus

brews.name: Elderflower Ale
brews.description: Cwrw Ysgawen/Elderflower Ale is a refreshing pale ale brewed from Welsh mountain water and natural ingredients. Cascade hops are used for aroma, with the added indulgence of elderflowers, creating a superb floral bouquet and a delectable sweet citrus finish.

brews.name: Beach House
brews.description: Pale Ale brewed with Motueka, Mosaic & Simcoe.

brews.name: Bounced Right Back
brews.description: Pale Ale hopped with Citra & Rakau

brews.name: Session
brews.description: Our flagship modern session pale ale. Hopped with Amarillo, Citra and Mosaic to deliver big citrus aromas, with a crisp dry finish. Refreshing and then some, it’s got all the tropical wallop you want with an all-dayer percentage.

brews.name: Small Man's Wetsuit
brews.description: Petite pale dry hopped with Idaho 7, Citra & Galaxy. Submerged in hops with a gentle tropicality. Soft corners, light bitterness, and a stonefruit edge. Neoprene can bring a tear to your eye.

brews.name: Sonoma
brews.description: Sonoma encapsulates what we love at Track. A refreshing, sessionable, hazy pale ale to be shared, which shows our love for hops & the pursuit of pale perfection. With a simple malt base & hopped generously with Mosaic, Centennial & Citra it bursts forth with resinous notes of sticky mandarin and grapefruit. It finishes crisp & clean with a soft, pithy bitterness.

brews.name: Maverick IPA
brews.description: One of our longest serving beers. The hop level in Maverick IPA is a little more trad than in our canned IPAs, being nicely balanced and integrated within the beer. Lightly caramelized malts provide the central core, but the American Cascade is still the main attraction bringing grapefruit and floral aromas to the beer, which finishes with a clean, refreshing bitterness.

brews.name: Sunset
brews.description: American style IPA at an easy-drinking ABV. The classic combo of Chinook, Centennial, Columbus and Simcoe hops provide plenty of pine and resinous flavours with a fruity top note. Goes down beautifully at the end of the day.

brews.name: Riotous Oat Break
brews.description: Triple hopped IPA packed with flaked oats. Riotously hopped with the incomparable Australian hop Galaxy, the awesome Simcoe & our old friend Amarillo. Citrus, peach & passion fruit from the Galaxy, with a luscious mouthfeel and smooth finish from the oats. A burst of orange from the Amarillo, apricot, passion fruit, pine & woodsy earth from the Simcoe. Opaque and full of fresh hoppy goodness.

brews.name: California Sun
brews.description: California Sun is a west coast session IPA built for easy drinking. Classic hop flavours of pine, resin and citrus fruit dominate over chewy malt, with a tantalising bitter, dry finish.

brews.name: Jaipur
brews.description: Jaipur is our flagship beer, and the one that really put us on the map back in 2005 when we were just starting out. We are often told “this is the beer, that got me into beer” and we are always very proud to hear this. It’s usually recognised as the first UK craft IPA, and was brewed with a huge amount of US hops at a time where this was very unusual, these provide a fantastic experience of grapefruit, lemon and tropical fruit with an enticing bitterness. We balance these with a great English malt base of Low Colour Maris Otter from Norfolk that helps keep the beer light and drinkable with enough sweetness to keep it all in harmony.

brews.name: Melba
brews.description: Melba pours a light gold in colour and its peachy character is complemented beautifully by the use of highly aromatic US hops

brews.name: The Union
brews.description: Introducing a BRAND NEW beer, brewed exclusively on the Thornbridge Union. The Union 6% India Pale Ale is created using the very best ingredients we can find and then fermented in our new Union set.

brews.name: Hen Cloud
brews.description: A delightful IPA which is low in weight, high on taste. Receives rave reviews for it's unctuous flavour profile and mouthfeel. A refreshing pale amber beer with a fragrant hop aroma; it's the perfect accompaniment to welcome in Spring!

brews.name: The Mancunian Blonde
brews.description: SORTED. Mancunian is a blonde-IPA hybrid, drawing on the best of both styles to create a real crowd-pleasing beer. Amber and Crystal malts included in the purposefully delicately flavoured malt bill give a blonde with more depth, onto which we layer full flavoured Cascade, Columbus, Citra and Comet hops.

brews.name: Summer Meadow
brews.description: Summer Meadow is a light, hoppy, Summer ale, with a hint of citrus and blackcurrant.

brews.name: Hopster
brews.description: The newest addition to our core range of beers. A modern beer initially based on the steampunk movement and like Hydes, combining the traditional and the contemporary. A refreshing, zesty blonde coloured ale. We use malt, wheat and flaked rice with plenty of Citra hops for a zingy, citrus hit. You don’t have to be hipster to love Hopster.

brews.name: Ryes Against
brews.description: Crafted with an adventurous spirit, this Rye Pale is a testament to the timeless allure of rye, reimagined for the modern palate. Experience a harmonious blend of rich malt character and the distinctive spiciness of rye, intermingled with the citrus and floral hops finished with a crisp, refreshing hop bitterness.

brews.name: Anvil Best
brews.description: A traditional best bitter celebrating our old ‘Anvil Brand’ at its best. It has a bold hop-forward palate with an earthy and herbal character, which then delivers a biscuit and caramel flavour. The finish is mildly bitter with a brief pop of lemon and an earthy note of black tea. The aroma has a pleasant spicy, fruity scent. Available July & August 2024

brews.name: Lowry
brews.description: A beautifully crafted golden ale, a fitting tribute to the world renowned artist L.S.Lowry. With citrus and tropical flavours this is a beer for “hop heads”.

brews.name: Manchester Bitter
brews.description: Our most traditional core beer is inspired by a Manchester stalwart; a fondly-remembered original. Speciality malt gives the deep golden colour and robust base, balanced by crisp bitterness and a floral, lemony aroma.

brews.name: Cruffatin
brews.description: Cruffatin the malty little sipper, at a gentle pace we enjoy a lovely pint of Best Bitter.

brews.name: Dark Side of the Moose
brews.description: Ochr Dywyll Y Mŵs/Dark Side of the Moose is a delicious dark ale brewed from Welsh mountain water and natural ingredients. Using a delicate blend of dark crystal malt, roasted barley and Bramling Cross hops the 'Dark Side' exhibits a rich malty flavour balanced with fruity bitterness.

brews.name: Sir Philip
brews.description: An original premium bitter - enduring in our line up and for good reason. Full taste with light malty overtones. Amber in colour, this premium bitter has light malty overtone, balanced with the classic pairing of Fuggles and Target hops.

brews.name: Chocolate Cherry Mild
brews.description: Chocolate Cherry Mild has all the class of "Dunham Dark", with a dry hint of cherry that cuts through the beer.

brews.name: Mild
brews.description: Eight different malts were used to create this balance Mild. Hints of caramel and chocolate are layered in the modern interpretation of a classic British style. A rich dark colour with a dry finish.

brews.name: Heartless
brews.description: Brewed with chocolate malts purely for your delight and delectation this deliciously drinkable stout is as luxuriant as it is memorable. A beautiful balance of dark chocolate bitterness and smooth roast coffee.

brews.name: Chocolate Stout
brews.description: Originally brewed as a father's day request for a Manchester Chocolatier this stout has a chocolate backbone without ever coming over too sweet. Malts kilned until they’ve developed a chocolate flavour, the rawest form of chocolate and a good helping of the best cacao powder makes this an extremely drinkable mid-abv stout. Originally thought of as a limited edition, this beer quite literally forced its way into our line up. Like any great mule it comes with an ingrained sense of self-preservation.

brews.name: Way Out Wheat More or Less
brews.description: Back in the day a little brewery called Offbeat brewed a Hefeweizen. A delicious hazy wheat beer with banana, clove and a hint of bubble-gum, it was a cult classic! Now reimagined for the next generation of drinker, let us reintroduce to you Way Out Wheat, well More or Less.

brews.name: Pilsner
brews.description: Pilsner

brews.name: Green Mountain AF
brews.description: Green Mountain is one of our most popular beers and our brewers knew they could create a fantastic alcohol free version which encompasses the same great juicy and tropical flavours of the original. After some detailed recipe development, we’re very happy with the results. It pours a beautiful hazy gold, with the classic aromas of mango and pineapple leading to a soft and well-rounded mouthfeel

brews.name: Dunham Disco
brews.description: Dry, and having funky taste. Made with some organic ingredients.

brews.name: Dance Commander
brews.description: A marriage of Russet and Bramley cider, fresh Braeburn and Sour Red Cherry juices combine to bring you tartness from the cherries, balanced by the juicy sweetness of red cherries. All hovering on a vinous cider base. Cracking in the sun.

brews.name: Shimmy
brews.description: Lovingly referred to as the “tangbomb” at Ascension HQ! This blend of wild cider, pineapple and lemon, offers a fruit forward, refreshing taste, with prominent tart pineapple and wild cider notes.

gins.name: Capesthorne - Classic Cheshire Gin
gins.description: Lovingly hand-crafted in Cheshire on Penelope, our 400L still. This classic style gin is packed full of juniper, angelica, citrus & cubeb with a complex finish.

gins.name: Lymm Gin - London Dry Gin
gins.description: Containing Seven Signature Botanicals of Juniper, Grapefruit, Kaffir Lime and finally Hibiscus with a citrus kick

gins.name: Forest Gin
gins.description: The only gin to win 2 double-gold medals at the San Francisco World Spirit Awards in the same year. Selected as one of the Worlds Best 50 Gins. Distilled in the heart of the Macclesfield Forest in batches of 85 bottles at a time, each bottle containing only the finest botanicals and spring water.

gins.name: Hepple Gin
gins.description: Heavily awarded, Hepple is the ultimate modern gin, an intense yet elegant reinvention of a classic gin, elevated through our use of botanicals picked fresh from our home in Northumberland and next-generation distilling techniques

gins.name: Hills and Harbour
gins.description: With local Noble Fir needles and Bladderwrack Seaweed, it leads with juniper and is balanced with hints of forest fir, tropical fruit, citrus spice, tangy sherbet and a subtle scent of the shore.

gins.name: Falmouth Black Rock
gins.description: **WINNER OF BEST ENGLISH CLASSIC GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2023**Falmouth Black Rock Cornish Gin is an exciting Cornish Gin, with a design to match our stunning landscape and based around the fantastic history of the harbour of Falmouth this gin has it all.Crisp and juniper forward with lemon verbena and lemon peel for a citrus edge, elderberries for a smooth earthiness and eucalyptus this gin is delicious served with Navas tonic and a generous wedge of lemon.

gins.name: Height of Arrows - Heavy
gins.description: **WINNER OF BEST SCOTTISH CLASSIC GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2023** A modern, simplified gin with a clean, refreshing and uniquely smooth character. Crafted with 3 unique ingredients- juniper, Isle of Skye Sea Salt and sustainable beeswax; for flavour, depth and texture.

gins.name: Hensol Castle
gins.description: **WINNER OF BEST WELSH CLASSIC GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2023**The jewel in our crown, award winning Hensol Castle Gin is a traditional copper pot distilled London Dry gin. Juniper led, driven by hand-peeled citrus and our wildflower medley that’s grown in the ground of our own castle. It’s the perfect balance of spice and sweet botanicals

gins.name: Weavers Irish Gin
gins.description: **WINNER OF BEST IRISH CLASSIC GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2023**For more than three hundred years, linen was Ireland’s largest industry. Inspired by our ancestors’ industrial spirits and created in honour of the men and women who toiled in the flax fields and laboured in the linen mills of Ulster, we have created Weavers Irish Gin. A rich tapestry of flavours, Weavers Dry Gin as crisp, cool and clean as the linen it is inspired by.

gins.name: Capesthorne Rhubarb & Lavendar
gins.description: Lovingly hand-crafted in Cheshire, this intriguing yet tried and test combination of flavours epitomises all things British, with floral notes combined with the tart yet sweet taste of the rhubarb makes for a distinctive and moreish gin experience.

gins.name: Lymm Gin - Blood Orange
gins.description: Small batch gin distilled and bottled in Cheshire. Distinct flavours of blood orange.

gins.name: Lymm Gin - Raspberry
gins.description: Containing the usual suspects of Juniper and Coriander, add Ginger, Vanilla and Mint along with pure Raspberry Concentrate its delicious.  A palate of Raspberry at the front with Juniper and spices at the back a truly exceptional taste bud explosion.

gins.name: Capesthorne - Raspberry & Blueberry
gins.description: Lovingly hand-crafted in Cheshire on Penelope, our 400L still. Sweet berries combine with the juniper to deliver a taste sensation. Complex and fresh with plenty citrus this pink gin delivers on all fronts.

gins.name: Three Wrens - Exquisite Citrus Gin
gins.description: Our award-winning gin offers dry, crisp tasting notes with an explosion of aromatic citrus and a velvety finish. Each citrus element is distilled separately, before being blended with pure juniper distillate, for a truly unique gin that will please the purists and everyday gin drinkers alike.

gins.name: Three Wrens - Key Lime Pie
gins.description: Unmistakable biscoff on the nose, giving way to bright zesty citrus notes and a well balanced mouthfeel. Hints of vanilla and cheesecake, fresh lime and subtle meadow flowers.

gins.name: Three Wrens - Passionfruit
gins.description: Distilled with Juniper and sweet orange peel in the pot, with freshly sliced passion fruits in the botanical basket, so the vapour travels through the fruit, picking up the flavour. Pure organic passion fruit juice is blended into the gin to add even more delicious and natural flavour.

gins.name: Three Wrens - Apple Crumble
gins.description: Our multi award-winning Apple Crumble Gin offers tasting notes of juniper, baked apple, cinnamon and rich toasted oats as a perfect gin paired with lighter drinks in summer or warming recipes in the colder months.

gins.name: Three Wrens - Rhubarb
gins.description: Searching for a gin that is both elegant and full of flavour? Our Rhubarb gin is distilled using 8 different botanicals including juniper, rhubarb, cassia and vanilla giving it an intensely fruity palate with a deliciously dry finish

gins.name: Hensol Castle - Wild Strawberry and Hibiscus
gins.description: **WINNER OF BEST WELSH FLAVOURED GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2023**Our beautiful pink gin, bursting with wild strawberries and hibiscus flower, is a luscious twist on our classic award-winning Welsh dry gin

gins.name: The Edge Gin - Pear
gins.description: Crisp and delicious, juniper lead with a smooth fruity finish.

gins.name: The Edge Gin - Fruits of the Forest
gins.description: A burst of sweetness from the raspberries , blueberries, straw­berries and blackberries. Crisp juniper shines through with warming notes of cinnamon and star anise.

gins.name: The Edge Gin L'orange
gins.description: This premium small batch L'Orange gin has been lovingly created by mixing our London Dry with a generous addition of orange zest. The addition of the orange zest has given our gin a lovely natural citrus finish and not too sweet.

gins.name: Three Wrens - English Herb Garden
gins.description: Limited edition gin made in small batches. Distilled with rosemary, thyme & basil, grown at Three Wrens HQ. Brand new recipe packed with 50% more herbs than our earlier version, plus 3 varieties of rich Juniper from Italy, Albania & Macedonia

gins.name: Forest gin - Earl Grey
gins.description:
We pick ingredients from the local forest such as bilberry, wild raspberry, gorse flower, pine and moss. These are ground by hand in a pestle & mortar with traditional gin ingredients, including Organic Juniper, Organic coriander seed, liquorice and vanilla.
These freshly ground ingredients are then distilled just once in our tiny 30 litre pot still, before the addition of an incredible blend of Earl Grey Tea by Cheshire blenders Quinteassential, along with our own spring water from the ground beneath the distillery.
The resulting spirit retains all of the herbal, earthy flavours of Forest Gin, whilst the addition of the Earl Grey Tea blend adds sumptuous, delicate notes from oolong, cornflowers and Sicilian bergamot

gins.name: Whitley Neill rhubarb and ginger alcohol free
gins.description: Whitley Neill Rhubarb & Ginger 0.0% Alcohol free spirit - made from our award-winning Rhubarb Gin. Full flavour. Zero compromises.

gins.name: Strykk Not Gin
gins.description: Savor the authentic taste and mindful craftsmanship of Strykk Not Gin, designed to echo the classic gin experience without the alcohol. Authentic Flavor Profile: Immerse yourself in the rich, complex blend of juniper, coriander, sage, and basil. Each sip transports you to the heart of classic gin experiences

gins.name: GinSin Tangerine alcohol free
gins.description: Alcohol free gin – flavours of tangerine and citrus. In this alcohol-free gin twelve botanical elements and citrus are combined with the flavour of tangerines.

about:
The Lymm Beer Festival was the brainchild of the Lymm and District Round Table member Chris Stephens. Started in 2011, the Lymm Beer Fest has quickly established itself as a firm favourite with local people and has become one of the three main annual charity events organised by Lymm and District Round Table in order to raise money for local charities and community groups. The other events are the Lymm Charity Duck Race and the Big Lymm Fireworks.

The event will take place in the Lymm Village Hall and will offer over 35 carefully selected real ales, ciders and perries. Lymm Ladies will also be serving a fantastic selection of gins. There will be live music involving a host of talented local bands and singers, and a selection of food to purchase, with all profits going to charity. For those abstaining or driving we will also be offering free soft drinks.
